trip up.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to make a mistake, or to force someone to make a mistake by tricking them
trip up.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: On his latest album, Kowalski trips up attempting more modern songs.
an attempt to trip up the prime minister on policy issues
trip up.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to hit something with your foot so that you fall, or to make someone do this
trip up.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: He chased the thief, tripped him up, and grabbed the camera.
